channel.title: A new kind of rsps! never done before {pi}
channel.description: The server will not be completed, more people are saying they dislike it then like it. To all the people who said they liked it and to finish, thank you for support but im sorry :( it wont be finished. [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/1.jpg[/img]

item.title: A new kind of rsps! never done before {pi}
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

Soulcist doesn’t understand this so far because Soulcist sees ONLY NPC dialogue and that little easy removable tree anti-leech. Soulcist doesn’t believe this will make it far, however, Soulcist will hope for the best.

I gave him 4 lines of Player Dialogue to use if he knows how. I decided against giving 5-lined NPC/Player, even though It’s easily obtainable.

Read full topic
item.source: A new kind of rsps! never done before {pi}

item.title: A new kind of rsps! never done before {pi}
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

GRINER PROJECTS:

I just want you to know this is really good iv been visiting moparscape for about a year now at least every other day, and i never registered, i just now registered to leave this comment, and i will now start releasing my work just because of this work…

Griner-That means alot, thank you. Runewings- Thank you for the suggestion, i like the stones and rings idea, i will deffinitly use if i continue coding this.

Read full topic
item.source: A new kind of rsps! never done before {pi}

item.title: A new kind of rsps! never done before {pi}
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

If your going to do this, you should make it like a big game. 1 huge quest (the story line) with other little quests all over. I would also make a Free to Play are the home and have the story start in one town where you’ll eventually have to leave to go to another town (free to play area) and as you go from Town to Town you gain levels from skilling, quests and other things. Also make it so when you hit a new town you’ll unlock the teleport to access that town. Make a lot of solo minigames and secret bosses and dungeons spread over the map. Also like Team_Rocket said, make your dialogues and things the NPCs say interesting and add details. Bend the story line. Also use animations and forcechats once in awhile. Also, a cool idea is to make something like aura’s but instead call them power chrystals and have them give you special abilities. Same with Rings and Amulets. That would make an awesome game, just my suggestion!

Read full topic

item.title: A new kind of rsps! never done before {pi}
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:2, topic:427716”]Team_Rocket doesn’t like the following and gives advice:

  1. Fix simple common errors in the cache like the tree color.
  2. Fix the NPC Speaking frames.
  3. Learn to crop your screenshots.
  4. Don’t use PI… for anything… At all.
  5. If you’re going to have alot of dialogue, at least make it interesting. Also use decent grammar for it.
  6. The storyline is terrible and un-original.[/quote]
    bitchcat agrees with above statement.

Read full topic

item.title: A new kind of rsps! never done before {pi}
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:4, topic:427716”][quote author=eclipse rsps link=topic=530408.msg3872923#msg3872923 date=1325473552]

Team_Rocket doesn’t like the following and gives advice:

  1. Fix simple common errors in the cache like the tree color.
  2. Fix the NPC Speaking frames.
  3. Learn to crop your screenshots.
  4. Don’t use PI… for anything… At all.


[/quote]

Team_Rocket commends you for trying to make original content though. Team_Rocket has also edited the first post.[/quote]
Eclipse is wondering why Team_Rockets uses third person…
